articles.title: How to Send Money With WhatsApp Pay - NDTV
articles.description: How to Send Money With WhatsApp Pay
articles.content: Next, you just select payments, enter the amount, add a note if you want to, and then hit send. Finally, you'll have to enter your UPI PIN when prompted, and you're done.
